page.title: 19PEOPLE WHO HAVE HELPED
page.content: The Domesday Project was a big job & there were times when we felt it was very aptly named.The following people have helped & deserve thanks:-Children of classes 4,5&6 at{Queensway school}& their teachers Mrs.S.Parker Mr.D. Jackson and Mrs.S.Gilchrist. Mrs.O. Cooper,{Secretary}for typing,copying etc and Mr.S.Cooper for loan of camera and mounting photos.Mr.E.Waddicor, staff and children for putting up with the surveyors and their perpetual use of the computer.Miss.C.Askins & Miss Joanne Hibbert of{Trinity & All Saints {College}& Mrs.J.Turner.Mr.H.Schofield of Hilton Grange who organised his schools work & Miss Heald,Sharon Smith,Wendy Wilkinson,Samantha Leach Craig Waterson,Geoffrey Bowie & Leslie Stuart of{Springfield.}Adele Crump, Kirstie Herbert,Angela Deighton of Queensway who did topics,but no names.
